definitions.body: serpent-charming Ec 10:11; [[נְבוֹן לָָחַשׁ]] Is 3:3 (prob. more general).
charms, amulets, worn by women, Is 3:20.
whisper of prayer, [[חָקוּן לַחַשׁ]] Is 26:16 they pour forth a whisper of prayer (but Koppe Bö Gr Di Du rd. [[חְקוֹן לַחַשׁ]] ‘Zauberzwang,’ compulsion of (by) magic).
